thread.title: Nintendo Switch Price and Release Date Revealed
thread.title_full: Nintendo Switch Price and Release Date Revealed

author: Marty Sliva
title: Nintendo Switch Price and Release Date Revealed
text:
Nintendo Switch will launch on March 3, 2017 for $299.99 in North America. This announcement came during Nintendo’s Switch Presentation.
For context, PlayStation 4 currently starts at $299, PlayStation 4 Pro starts at $399, and Xbox One starts at $249.
Nintendo’s Wii U launched back in November 2012, with two separate SKUs that cost $299 and $349 respectively. Likewise, the Nintendo 3DS launched back in early 2011 for $299. For a full look at how Switch’s price stacks up historically, take a look at our feature comparing what consoles cost at launch over the past 35 years. 
Continue reading…
